Name: Realistic Tower Destruction
About the game: Game allows you to build many kinds of towers from a variety of bricks and experience their dynamic destruction physics in a sandbox environment. Different types of interaction. wrecking ball earthquake wind explosion Steam workshop support Build or improve on existing tower . You can then import them into the game, share them on the Steam workshop.
